function.name: ColouriseSpecmanDoc
function.parameter_list: (unsigned int startPos, int length, int initStyle, WordList *keywordlists[], Accessor &styler, bool caseSensitive)

unit.comment: // Store both the current line's fold level and the next lines in the
// level store to make it easy to pick up with each increment
// and to make it possible to fiddle the current level for "} else {".

function.name: FoldNoBoxSpecmanDoc
function.parameter_list: (unsigned int startPos, int length, int, Accessor &styler)

function.name: FoldSpecmanDoc
function.parameter_list: (unsigned int startPos, int length, int initStyle, WordList *[], Accessor &styler)

function.name: ColouriseSpecmanDocSensitive
function.parameter_list: (unsigned int startPos, int length, int initStyle, WordList *keywordlists[], Accessor &styler)
